body: I heard that people got permanently banned from avicus network but they told me that they were unbanned like 2 months later. How does permanent ban work in avicus network.
body_tagged: I heard that people got permanently banned from avicus network but they told me that they were unbanned like 2 months later. How does permanent ban work in avicus network.
title: HOw long is a Permanent ban in Avicus Network

replies.body: It is permanent unless you appeal it
replies.body_tagged: It is permanent unless you appeal it
